title: Conflicts related to protected areas
author: GPSDD
intro: Number of conflicts contrasted with protected areas.
content: Bubble map of events or conflicts on a global scale, contrasted with a layer of protected areas. Visualisation built using CARTO and vue.js

title: Regions with greatest water risks
author: GPSDD
intro: South Africa map detailing risks associated with population and water presence.
content: Tabular view of South Africa's top regions associated with water risk, as well as map with layers representing water transitions, water basins and population. Visualisation built using CARTO and vue.js

title: GEE Nightlights analysis
author: GPSDD
intro: A jupyter notebook with examples on how to query API Highways for Google Earth Engine datasets information.
content: A jupyter notebook with examples on how to query API Highways for Google Earth Engine datasets information. The notebooks provides some scaffolding to make API requests, example queries to Google Earth Engine datasets, a global analysis on the trends of nighttime lights emission based on the DMSP-OLS Nighttime Lights Time Series (https://ngdc.noaa.gov/eog/dmsp/downloadV4composites.html), and a map visualization of the results centered in Ghana --its boundaries extracted from the Simplified Large Scale International Boundaries (LSIB) dataset (https://catalog.data.gov/dataset/global-lsib-lines-simplified-2017mar30).
